content: Update API functions to match backend endpoints specification
Fix chore status workflow - complete/approve/needs_redo actions
Enhance create chore dialog with point value presets (5,10,15,20+)
Add due date alerts and overdue indicators to chore cards
Implement proper error handling with retry logic and offline support
Add loading states and optimistic updates for all chore operations
Implement proper pending approval queue for parents
Add point award notifications and celebration animations
Test all chore flows end-to-end with proper status transitions
